full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BLO SBYONG SNYAN BRGYUD CHEN MO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @085B SVASTI, SNANG MTHA'I SANGS RGYAS NGUR SMRIG ZLOS GAR GYIS, ,RNAM ROL LNGA BRGYA'I GTZUG RGYAN AA TI SHA ,BYANG CHUB SEMS KYI BKA' BABS 'CHAD KHA'I ZHABS, ,RGYAL SRAS THOGS MED BRGYUD PAR BCAS LA 'DUD, ,GANG GI ZHAL GYI BUM BZANG LAS 'ONG BA'I, ,GSUNG RAB KUN GYI BCUD BSDUS LAM SGRON DANG, ,BLO SBYONG DON BDUN 'GREL BAR BCAS PA'I PAR, ,@086A *, ,THO YON BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN ZHES BYAS BSGRUBS, ,CHOS SBYIN GTER GYI SGO PHE'I LHAG BSAM MTHUS, ,RGYAL BSTAN BSHAD SGRUB SGO NAS RAB RGYAS SHING, ,MAR GYUR 'GRO KUN BLO SBYANGS SEMS 'DUL NAS, ,BYANG CHUB SEMS 'BYONGS KUN MKHYEN MYUR THOB SHOG ,CES RGYAL BA'I GSUNG RAB KUN GYI SNYIN PO BYANG CHUB LAM GYI SGRON MA DANG, GDAMS NGAG KUN GYI YANG RTZE BLO SBYONG DON BDUN 'GREL BAR BCAS PA'I PAR, THO YON BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS LHAG BSAM DAG PAS BSGRUBS PA'I PAR BYANG DGOS TSUL LTAR, ^SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG 'JAM DPAL BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS BKOD PA'I YI GE PA NI DGE TSUL BLO BZANG DGE 'DUN NO,, ,,
